name: Chicken Parm Sandwiches
description: Turn your kitchen into a little Italian haven while redefining your sandwich game. Italian Meatball Seasoning cleverly doubles as a gluten-free breading with all the classic flavours of Italian herbs. We like our sammies spread with a little Roasted Garlic Aioli.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425Â° F. Place two Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly brush racks with oil to prevent sticking.

To thinly slice chicken, place one hand on one breast and press down firmly. Curve fingers up slightly for safety. Carefully slice meat horizontally. Repeat with remaining chicken. You should have eight pieces in total.
In a bowl, toss chicken with mayo.
Place seasoning in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing to coat with seasoning.
Place chicken on racks, leaving some space between each piece. Bake 15 min.
Remove pan from oven and top each chicken with 1⁄4 cup sauce and 1 tbsp cheese. Bake for an additional 5 min, or until chicken is cooked.
Split and toast buns, if desired. Divide arugula between bottom halves of split buns; top each with a piece of chicken and cover with top bun.
tips: If following the Epic Life program, prepare Marinara Sauce with low-sodium, crushed and diced tomatoes.
Swap 2 pkgs Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix for Italian Meatball Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
